title: Spacious 2500 S.F. STOCKBRIDGE Duplex
posting_body: NO SPAM TEXTS OR CALLS.
This surprisingly spacious unit in Stockbridge's popular Sentry Oak community is on a private, cozy cul de sac.
It has 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.
The unit a large living room, separate dining room, lots of closet space throughout and plenty of kitchen cabinet space.
It has a long driveway to accommodate your family and guests.
Text immediately to schedule a tour.
This STOCKBRIDGE HOUSE won't Last.
We've leased Many Homes all over the Atlanta metro to very satisfied customers.
Text NOW for more details, photos, and to Schedule your Private Tour!
Please include your full name and email.
* Friendly, prompt, professional service.
* We can assist you in locating other properties as well.
* Please be ready to move within 3 weeks max.
* Please be available to view property within 2 days.
Homes in this area do not stay long on the market.
No past evictions, open bankruptcies, collections, judgments.
* Must be able to demonstrate gainful employment, and total combined household gross income must be at least 3 times the rent or higher.
* Pets are case-by-case basis with $300 per pet fee.
Call for questions or for assistance.
Kemi Salako
Real Estate Broker, Elegance Realty, LLC
Marketing Agent, HomeRiver Group
BUSINESS HOURS:
Office Hours: Monday-Friday (9-5)
All calls/texts will receive replies during business hours.
Please do not text/call after 5pm nor on Sundays.
